supplier_of: fruits, dried | olive oil | figs | organic | chocolate
information: Organic and Gourmet products derivated of the dried figs and Olive oil with great healthy properties, coming from our fields of organic farming. Ecoficus is a family business, with a large experience in the production and distribution of organic products, therefore we have fully control of the product from the trees care to the final production in the factory, as they say "from the field to the table". This fact has allowed us making a of foods of the highest quality recognized in more than 15 countries around the world. Our origins are in a mountainous region of the center of Extremadura (Spain) where figs and olive trees were introduced by the Arabs peoples during XII century. With this fantastic raw material and a pollution free environment, being one of the wildest in Europe, our company has managed to produce a very original and healthy list of products. Ecologic Extra Virgin Olive Oil Figs Bombon Dried Raw Figs Fig cake with orange Fig Snacks All our products has been made with eco ingredients, are vegan suitable, gluten free and added sugar free (bombon contains eco cane sugar).
keywords: Fruits, dried, Olive oil, figs, organic, chocolate
